name: Coffee & Cults: A Deep Dive Into Hollywood

episodes.title: How Diddy Helped Make J Lo A Music Star & Bought Her Silence
episodes.description: Diddy & Jennifer Lopez were an item back in the late 1990's and early 2000's and during their relationship the both went through huge life altering moments. During their relationship Diddy helped J Lo break into the music scene and become a star. At the same time, Diddy & J Lo were involved in a sho*oting at Club New York just prior to New Years 1999. Both J Lo & Diddy were arrested & evidence & accusations stacked up, although surprisingly after a ling trial, Diddy walked away completely exonerated. This event went on to create headline after headline, & despite Combs was charged with serious crimes, J Lo remained loyal and by his side. J Lo has kept the details of that night a secret, & a lot of mystery remains around it still to this day, which is why we’ll be taking a closer look at what really happened, because there is SO much more to the story of how Jennifer Lopez gained her enormous music career, her relationship with Combs & her career in present day. It seems as though after decades of rudeness, poor treatment of others & horrendous behaviour, J Lo's past, actions & behaviour has finally caught up to her. VIDEO VERSION AVAILABLE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=APWMDCfCh84&ab_channel=CoffeeandCults YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@coffeeandcults There are a lot of other videos & deep dives on my YouTube channel, Coffee & Cults, THANK YOU so much for watching & let me know your thoughts in the comments! INSTA: https://www.instagram.com/theashsilver/ & https://www.instagram.com/coffeeandcultsyt SOURCES: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Qu41VDDVccHqQVrTh7Q5WdHCnwI8pP__F0WvzRkm6RM/edit?usp=sharing MY PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/coffeeandcultsextra/ YOUTUBE MEMBERSHIP: https://www.youtube.com/@coffeeandcults/membership
